name: 4.8.2-beta.1
releaseNotes:
- Added support for opening URL
- Added support for opening temporary sites on the sidebar
- Improved the color scheme of customized sites
- The dock won't be displayed when playing in full-screen mode (Mac)
- Fixed the language code bug that might lead to wrong Czech translations
- Fixed a bug where controllers might not hide automatically
- Resolved a compatibility issue with TrueHD codec audio tracks
- Resolved some issues that were caused by exiting playing mode
<!---->
- 增加打开网页URL功能
- 增加侧边栏临时站点
- 优化了自定义站点的配色方案
- 全屏时不再触发显示底部任务栏 (Mac)
- 修复捷克语 Czech 翻译和显示问题
- 修复控件有时不会自动消失的问题
- 修复对 TrueHD 音频格式的支持问题
- 修复快速退出播放模式时数据可能损坏的问题
